title: How do I clean my B1?
answer:
You can use damp tissues or cloth to clean your B1 and then use dry cloth or tissues to dry it up. 

 Note the following when cleaning your B1: 

 l Do not use any chemical cleaning agents. 

 l Clean your headset and wrist band separately. Avoid immersing your B1 for a long time. 

 l Residual water on the microphone or earphone may affect your call quality. Use tissues to absorb the water.
